jobs.title: Developer / Web Support Service Manager
jobs.description: Develop custom responsive websites and WordPress themes from design comps with focus on page speed, browser and cross-platform compatibility, and SEO. Manage and provide 24/7 support for all sites.
points: Facilitate project launches, taking sites from the development server, to staging and production
Handle content management and training for clients
Support, assist, and troubleshoot issues pertaining to website functionality

jobs.title: Production Artist
jobs.description: Print liaison, working closely with the art director to bridge the gap between designers and commercial printers by providing print production services using the latest versions of Adobe Creative Cloud
points: Create POS displays from printer specs
Build food packaging art to printer templates
Supply print ready PDFs of business stationery to printing partners

jobs.title: Co-Owner
jobs.description: As one half of a "mom and pop", I take on many responsibilties including: Photoshop production and color artist, developer, customer service representative, shipping and receiving, delivery, accounting, etc.

jobs.title: Technology Lead / Production Specialist
jobs.description: Responsible for a network consisting of Macintosh, Windows and Unix operating systems and a team of five operators. In 2001, led a three man team making the transition from film to an all digital workflow powered by the Creo Brisque 4 Impose, output to Trendsetter Spectrum (Imation), Iris 43Wide and Epson 9500.
points: Development, implementation and support of workflows and solutions for software and hardware limitation issues
Work closely with clients and sales staff to ensure a smooth transition from design to print

sites.description: Custom WordPress build from supplied Photoshop comps, custom post types for locations and available jobs. Training and support.
Custom WordPress build from supplied Photoshop comps, custom post types for "Voices" section, FoxyCart integration, connect site to organization's social networks and MailChimp. Training and support.
Custom WordPress build from supplied Photshop comps, FoxyCart integration for custom e-commerce solution.
